item.content:encoded:
Getting your small business or startup in the public limelight would have been considered an arduous challenge a decade ago. Today‚Äôs entrepreneurs have the advantageous possibility of advertising their business on search engines‚Äîand it‚Äôs called Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

SEO is a crucial element of any digital marketing for any small business striving to succeed. Most people hop on Google whenever they‚Äôre searching for a service or product. If your website is ranking on the first pages for these targeted search terms, then your chances of improving web traffic, enhancing customer interaction and securing a conversion increases tremendously.

In today‚Äôs post, we‚Äôre going to be talking about Small Business SEO tips that collectively play a pivotal role in bringing about these conversion. As one of the leading Small Business SEO agency in the United States, we have put together 20 tips that you must incorporate in your SEO campaign.

1. Make sure your web copies are written for humans

Search engines are much smarter than you think. They can tell apart an organic sentence, link, and paragraph from forced ones. Don‚Äôt make the mistake of stuffing keywords on your website or keep talking about the same topics. It‚Äôs never worked before, and it won‚Äôt work for you any time soon.

2.¬†Narrow down your keyword list to use for your entire website

There‚Äôs no SEO without keywords. However, you don‚Äôt guarantee any visibility for search terms if you‚Äôve got pretty much every keyword stuffed into the mix. The aim is to develop ownership for a particular set of keywords, so if anyone looks it up, you‚Äôre the first result they get.

3.¬†Use Keyword Rich URLs for Landing Pages

If you want to know how to make domain names that are rich in the right keywords you can simply Google the results for your choice of keywords. For example, if your business sells men‚Äôs shoes then your folder and domain pages should clearly mention these two terms something like this:¬† http://www.yourdomainname.com/mens-shoes/mens-shoes-foldername.html.

4.¬†Don‚Äôt Go Overboard with Keyword Density

As a rule of thumb, the total number of keywords and related phrases that you have on your page should be somewhere between 3 and 6 percent of the total written content and links on a page. This rule goes beyond your homepage. Indeed, from an SEO point of view, it makes up nearly half of your search criterion but it‚Äôs important to have the rest of your pages contribute to the rankings too. For this, you‚Äôll need to ensure that there‚Äôs a certain theme that‚Äôs being followed across all pages because the more of them are ranked, the greater are your website‚Äôs chances of climbing up the SEO ranks.

5.¬†Titles are Entitled To Be Different For Each Page

Switch up your keyword phrases and mix up their combinations in a way that the first few words in your title are SEO-friendly. Also, try to keep all phrases under 70 characters.

6. Insert a Unique¬†Meta Description¬†For Each Page

Any time you look up a phrase on a search engine you‚Äôll notice a small piece of text accompanying every title. That‚Äôs a Meta description. It‚Äôs like a summary of your webpage but it‚Äôs also a very convincing call to action. For example:‚ÄúBuy stylish shoes for men today! We offer free shipping for all locally made shoes. For more information give us a call at 123 45.‚Äù

Try to keep the Meta description under 150 characters.

7.¬†Don‚Äôt Forget to Style Your Keywords

Keyword styles can really change the game. You need the search engines to pick up your keywords as organically as possible. For this purpose, using bold or italic fonts and header tags are crucial. If you‚Äôre not sure how to go about this one, try some Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) to match the layout and format with that of your website.

8.¬†Add ALT Tags Your Images

Whenever you‚Äôre naming your images, remember to insert your keywords and related phrases into the Alt tags as well. The contextual reference provided by Alt tags can really help pull your pages up the rankings.

9.¬†Smart inter-linking is Intelligent interlinking

We‚Äôve seen plenty of websites use internal links but very few of them do it right. Any time you have the opportunity to insert keywords to your webpages‚Äîdo it! Again, specificity in links is important.

10. Create an XML Sitemap

When your internal linking game is weak, it helps to have an XML sitemap that leads Google through all the most important pages on your website. In fact, all search engines love an XML site map.

This brings us to the next point.

11.¬†A Simple, Straightforward robots.txt File Is The Way to Go

These are files that can be considered a web crawler‚Äôs best friend. They tell search engines all the important details on what pages are allowed to be shown on their index. Now here‚Äôs a neat SEO trick; insert your XML sitemap location onto the robot TXT file so you don‚Äôt have to provide details to search engines on all URLs‚Äînow they can find it automatically!

12.¬†Your Website Must Have external links

SEO-friendly websites are those that aren‚Äôt afraid to link other related websites. The impact is greater when you‚Äôre linking to businesses and groups that are local‚Äînot just in terms of the city or state but also in terms of being in the same industry. Also, don‚Äôt forget to use keywords with all your external links!

13.¬†Update Your Website With New Content Frequently

Of every SEO tip that we‚Äôve mentioned here so far, we have a feeling that you‚Äôre probably worried the most about new content. Where do you get all that new information?

Don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôll help you! We‚Äôve produced over 20,000 SEO projects and are still going strong! We can help you churn out relevant content and add new pages to your site so you‚Äôre getting recommendations from others in your industry frequently.

14.¬†Make Sure You Are Getting Links from the Right People

You want to get links from all the popular websites in your industry. By popular, we mean the ones that rank on top. Make it a point to check the ranks of your chosen websites and ask them to link to you so you can link back to them. To make this effort more effective, give them a list of keywords that should go into the text. Emailing your peers can seem labor intensive but trust us; links from local industries can help your SEO ranking soar high in no time.

15.¬†Create a Linkable Page

When you want link-backs from visitors to your website, you need to make it as easy as possible for them to do the job. Create a page with your logos and keyword-laden text links and send them to your visitors, customers and subscribers.

16.¬†Broaden your SEO horizons

Don‚Äôt just stay cooped up in the corner of the SEO rankings with some trusty keywords and phrases. Make the online community feel your presence. You can do this by writing guest blogs for popular websites and industry leaders. You can also start your own blog and integrate with your website and social media pages. Perhaps, even submit some reviews or answer questions on chat forums and online knowledge communities. However, know when to stop because overdoing it can get you listed as a spammer.

17.¬†Get your website listed on various directories

Online directories have been with us for a long time and because of their high reputation search engines are likely to scan them for updated links. Note that some of these directories will require you to pay a small fee.However, the advantage of hiring a local SEO service firm is that you can get access to directory lists for a fraction of the cost.

18.¬†Cement your online presence with a little creativity

It‚Äôs tempting to chain down your content behind subscription fees and other exclusive membership programs but it helps to make a lot of your content available free of cost. Think of it this way, if you‚Äôre posting about giveaways, discount codes, contest prizes, tutorials and other freebies people are more likely to link to you and pass on the information. It‚Äôs a win-win situation for your small business!

19.¬† Syndicate Your Press Release Documents

Press releases are a great way to boost your outreach and become visible to an audience beyond your target market. Any time you‚Äôve introduced a new service or have created a new product, it‚Äôs time to send out a local or national press release.

20.¬†Get listed on¬†Google My Business

Getting listed on Google My Business or Google Places is a heavyweight move in the world of SEO marketing.This should improve your visibility for local searches and your small business should show up in the form of a Google Map too!

Final Word

There is a science to SEO for Small Businesses and it takes times to perfect. Years in fact. At Search Berg, we have the roadmap to put businesses on the road to digital success. This is due to the tried and tested policies we have put in place in our SEO process over the last decade; most of which we have shared in today‚Äôs post with our viewers. We hope that you will find these tips and strategies useful.

Get started with SEO today and take the first and decisive step towards digital success with award-winning SEO agency, Search Berg. Do let us know what you think about the post with your comments.

Marketing has experienced a significant shift in the last few decades. Businesses from a diverse range of industries are now abandoning old-school TV and billboard based techniques and using the internet as a channel through which they can connect with foreign consumers and expand their global reach. In fact, marketers across the globe have reportedly shrunk their conventional advertising budgets up to 28% to inflate the size of their digital marketing budget.

This shift in marketing trends has revolutionized modern automotive dealerships. Instead of listing their inventory in local newspapers or TV commercials, car dealers can now advertise to their target audiences through their websites. Customers can also use the internet to compare prices and their experience with dealers, which allows dealers to build credibility and use feedback to improve their operations.

However, with more and more auto dealers building their online identities, competition in the digital realm is rising. Car dealerships need to stay on top of the latest digital marketing trends and implement the same, in order to stand out and attract prospective customers.

Here are some SEO techniques driving the future of digital automotive marketing.
